types:type.name: timezones
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type timezones = {| abbreviation: String, client_ip: String, datetime: String, day_of_week: Number {"typeId": "int"}, day_of_year: Number {"typeId": "int"}, dst: Boolean, dst_from: String, dst_offset: Number {"typeId": "int"}, dst_until: String, raw_offset: Number {"typeId": "int"}, timezone: String, unixtime: Number {"typeId": "int"}, utc_datetime: String, utc_offset: String, week_number: Number {"typeId": "int"} |} {"example": "{\\\"abbreviation\\\":\\\"BST\\\",\\\"client_ip\\\":\\\"107.210.166.72\\\",\\\"datetime\\\":\\\"2021-04-15T19:38:24.492924+01:00\\\",\\\"day_of_week\\\":4,\\\"day_of_year\\\":105,\\\"dst\\\":true,\\\"dst_from\\\":\\\"2021-03-28T01:00:00+00:00\\\",\\\"dst_offset\\\":3600,\\\"dst_until\\\":\\\"2021-10-31T01:00:00+00:00\\\",\\\"raw_offset\\\":0,\\\"timezone\\\":\\\"Europe\\/London\\\",\\\"unixtime\\\":1618511904,\\\"utc_datetime\\\":\\\"2021-04-15T18:38:24.492924+00:00\\\",\\\"utc_offset\\\":\\\"+01:00\\\",\\\"week_number\\\":15}"}
